stack:stack.stack:script:
cp -R /usr/lib/syslinux/modules/bios/* /tftpboot/pxelinux/
TFTP_USERNAME="tftp" TFTP_DIRECTORY="/tftpboot" TFTP_ADDRESS="0.0.0.0:69" TFTP_OPTIONS="--secure"
systemctl enable tftpd-hpa systemctl start tftpd-hpa

cp -R /usr/share/syslinux/* /tftpboot/pxelinux/
[Unit] Description=Tftp Server Requires=tftp.socket Documentation=man:in.tftpd
[Service] ExecStart=/usr/sbin/in.tftpd --user root --verbose --secure /tftpboot StandardInput=socket
[Install] Also=tftp.socket
systemctl enable tftp.socket systemctl start tftp.socket
